start.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
start.author: Aristotle

good.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
good.author: Mark Twain

bad.text: The chains of habit are too weak to be felt until they are too strong to be broken.
bad.author: Samuel Johnson

category.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
category.author: Robert Collier

tasks.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
tasks.author: Zig Ziglar

goal.text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
goal.author: Antoine de Saint-ExupÃ©ry

frequency.text: Repetition is the mother of learning, the father of action.
frequency.author: Zig Ziglar

notification.text: An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory.
notification.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

habitType.title: Starting strong
habitType.content: Research shows that building positive habits is 2.5x more effective than breaking bad ones. Start with one habit and master it.

habitType.title: The science
habitType.content: Your brain forms new neural pathways with each repetition. Building good habits creates positive pathways faster than breaking old ones.

category.title: Focus matters
category.content: Studies show that people who focus on one category at a time are 67% more likely to succeed in building lasting habits.

category.title: Compound effect
category.content: Small, category-specific improvements compound over time. A 1% daily improvement leads to 37x better results in a year.

tasks.title: Keep it simple
tasks.content: Habits with 1-3 specific actions have an 80% higher success rate than vague goals. Clarity creates commitment.

tasks.title: Stack your habits
tasks.content: Link new habits to existing routines. This 'habit stacking' technique increases adherence by 58%.

goal.title: The 66-day truth
goal.content: Research from University College London found it takes an average of 66 days to form a habit. Give yourself time.

goal.title: Realistic timelines
goal.content: Short-term goals (21-30 days) work for simple habits. Complex behavior changes need 60-90 days to become automatic.

frequency.title: Daily wins
frequency.content: Daily habits are 2.5x more likely to stick than weekly ones. Consistency beats intensity every time.

frequency.title: Recovery matters
frequency.content: For physical habits, strategic rest days prevent burnout. Listen to your body while maintaining consistency.

notification.title: Environmental cues
notification.content: Notifications act as environmental triggers. Studies show they increase habit completion rates by 40%.

notification.title: Optimal timing
notification.content: Morning reminders have 65% completion rates vs 42% for evening. Choose times when your willpower is strongest.

good.title: Build a good habit
good.subtitle: Start something positive and transformative
good.description: Create new positive behaviors that align with your best self

bad.title: Quit a bad habit
bad.subtitle: Break free from what holds you back
bad.description: Replace unwanted patterns with healthier alternatives

socialProof.title: Don't just take our word for it

reviews.0: Helped me be more disciplined. A lot of thought put into the design!
reviews.1: The XP, streaks and gamification make you want to come back every day.
reviews.2: Clean design, satisfying progression system. Regular updates keep improving it.
reviews.3: Helped me start habits I'd been trying for years. The gaming aspect is fun!

impact.title: 80% of people give up their habits too early.
impact.subtitle: Not from lack of willpower â€” but from lack of motivation at the right time.
impact.punchline: Nuvoria turns every small win into an instant reward.

info.intro: Create shared habits with friends and build streaks together. Accountability meets motivation in a collaborative experience.

completion.title: Daily completion
completion.description: Each member completes their tasks individually. At midnight, the group's completion rate determines if the day is validated.

xp.title: XP rewards
xp.description: Earn +10 XP instantly when you complete a task. Get bonus XP at midnight: +50 XP for 100% completion, +35 XP for 50-99% completion. The more active members, the more XP you earn together.

streak.title: Validation rules
streak.description: 100% completion = perfect day with full bonus. 50-99% = validated day with reduced bonus. Below 50% = day not validated and streak breaks (unless saved).

tolerance.title: Weekly flexibility
tolerance.description: All groups get one 50% tolerance per week. If at least half the team completes their tasks, the day is validated with reduced bonus. After using this flexibility, you need 100% completion or the streak breaks.

weekly.title: Weekly bonus
weekly.description: Achieve 100% completion every day for a full week (Monday to Sunday), and earn a massive +200 XP bonus on Sunday midnight. Perfect teamwork deserves perfect rewards!

invite.title: Invite members
invite.description: Share your group's invitation code to invite new members. Tap the code to automatically copy it to your clipboard, then send it to your friends!

limits.title: Group limits
limits.description: With the free version, you can join up to 2 groups. Upgrade to Premium to join up to 5 groups and unlock exclusive features!

info.tip: Remember: consistency and teamwork are key. Even on tough days, your group is there to keep you motivated!

tierUp.title: TIER UP!
tierUp.congratulations: Your group has reached a new tier! Keep up the amazing teamwork!

levelUp.title: LEVEL UP!
levelUp.keepGoing: Great progress! Keep building those habits together!

list.noGroupsDescription: Create a group or join one to share your goals with others

dashboard.noHabitsDescription: Create your first shared habit to start the adventure together

quests.tracked_description: Keep an eye on your active achievements

help.title: How does it work?
help.intro: Achievements let you earn rewards by reaching your goals!
help.xp_description: Each completed achievement gives you XP to progress through your ranks.
help.titles_description: Unlock unique titles to display on your profile.
help.boosts_description: Get boosts that multiply your XP earnings for a limited time.
help.inventory_description: Find all your rewards in the inventory and activate your boosts whenever you want.

test_quest.name: First step
test_quest.description_long: Complete any habit once to unlock this quest

seven_sparks.name: Seven sparks
seven_sparks.description_short: Complete at least 1 habit on 7 distinct days
seven_sparks.description_long: Start your journey by completing at least one habit on 7 different days. Small steps lead to big changes.

task_master.name: Daily task master professional
task_master.description_long: Become a true productivity master by completing 50 tasks over a 30-day period.

habit_builder.name: Extraordinary habit architect builder
habit_builder.description_long: Prove your ability to juggle multiple habits by maintaining 5 active habits at the same time.

two_weeks_gentle.name: Two weeks gentle
two_weeks_gentle.description_short: Complete at least 1 habit on 30 distinct days
two_weeks_gentle.description_long: A full month of consistent practice. Consistency builds momentumâ€”keep showing up day after day.

thirty_days_drift.name: Thirty days drift
thirty_days_drift.description_short: Complete at least 1 habit on 60 distinct days
thirty_days_drift.description_long: Two months of sustained progress. Celebrate each day you show up and watch your habits transform your life.

perfect_day.name: Perfect day
perfect_day.description_short: Complete all your habits in a single day
perfect_day.description_long: Your first perfect day. Every habit checked, every promise kept. Feel the satisfaction of a day well done.

perfect_week.name: Perfect week
perfect_week.description_short: Complete all your habits for 7 days
perfect_week.description_long: A week of perfection. Seven days where you showed up completely, proving your commitment to yourself.

perfect_three_weeks.name: Three week perfection
perfect_three_weeks.description_short: Complete all your habits for 21 days
perfect_three_weeks.description_long: Three flawless weeks. You've turned excellence into a habit, proving that perfection is a daily choice.

perfect_month.name: Flawless month
perfect_month.description_short: Complete all your habits for 30 days
perfect_month.description_long: An entire month of absolute perfection. You've demonstrated exceptional mastery of your routines and discipline.

streak_seven.name: First spark of consistency
streak_seven.description_short: Maintain a 7-day streak on one habit
streak_seven.description_long: Seven consecutive days on the same habit. The flame of consistency ignites - keep feeding it.

streak_twentyone.name: Three week ritual
streak_twentyone.description_short: Maintain a 21-day streak on one habit
streak_twentyone.description_long: Twenty-one days of dedication. They say it takes 21 days to form a habit - you've done it.

streak_thirty.name: Month of devotion
streak_thirty.description_short: Maintain a 30-day streak on one habit
streak_thirty.description_long: An entire month without interruption. This habit is now an integral part of who you are.

streak_sixty.name: Habit marathoner
streak_sixty.description_short: Maintain a 60-day streak on one habit
streak_sixty.description_long: Sixty days of unwavering consistency. You've proven you're a marathoner of personal change.

streak_hundred.name: Unshakeable legend
streak_hundred.description_short: Maintain a 100-day streak on one habit
streak_hundred.description_long: One hundred consecutive days. You are a living legend of perseverance. This habit is engraved in your identity.

tasks_25.name: Task beginner
tasks_25.description_long: Your first 25 tasks completed! Every small action adds up to big results.

tasks_50.name: Task enthusiast
tasks_50.description_long: Fifty tasks done! You're building momentum and proving your dedication.

tasks_100.name: Task champion
tasks_100.description_long: One hundred tasks conquered! You're a true champion of productivity.

tasks_200.name: Task master
tasks_200.description_long: Two hundred tasks achieved! Your consistency is remarkable and inspiring.

tasks_500.name: Task legend
tasks_500.description_long: Five hundred tasks completed! You've reached legendary status in task completion.

rate_app.name: Community supporter
rate_app.description_short: Rate the app and leave a review
rate_app.description_long: Help others discover the app by rating it and sharing your experience. Your support means the world to us!

first_comeback.name: First comeback
first_comeback.description_long: Life happens, but you came back. Your first comeback proves that falling off isn't failingâ€”getting back up is what matters.

phoenix.name: Phoenix
phoenix.description_long: Three times you've risen from the ashes. Like the phoenix, you've proven that every setback is just a setup for a comeback.

invincible.name: Invincible spirit
invincible.description_long: Ten comebacks. You are unstoppable. Your resilience is legendaryâ€”nothing can keep you down for long.

double_focus.name: Double focus
double_focus.description_long: Balance begins with two. You've started building a multi-faceted routine that touches different areas of your life.

quadra.name: Quadra balance
quadra.description_long: Four pillars of personal growth. You're building a well-rounded routine that covers multiple aspects of self-improvement.

hexagon.name: Hexagon master
hexagon.description_long: Six distinct habits conquered. You've achieved remarkable balance, nurturing growth in every direction of your life.

light_week.name: Light week
light_week.description_short: Complete 40% of possible habits this week
light_week.description_long: A gentle start to weekly consistency. Even light engagement builds the foundation for greater achievements.

active_week.name: Active week
active_week.description_short: Complete 60% of possible habits this week
active_week.description_long: More than half your weekly potential reached! You're finding your rhythm and building serious momentum.

intense_week.name: Intense week
intense_week.description_short: Complete 80% of possible habits this week
intense_week.description_long: An intense week of dedication! You're pushing your limits and showing what true commitment looks like.

perfect_intensity_week.name: Perfect weekly intensity
perfect_intensity_week.description_short: Complete 100% of possible habits this week
perfect_intensity_week.description_long: Every single habit, every single day this week. Absolute perfection in weekly dedicationâ€”you are extraordinary!

habit_week.name: One week strong
habit_week.description_short: Complete at least 1 habit for 7 consecutive days
habit_week.description_long: A full week of showing up. This foundation proves you can maintain consistency when it matters.

double_routine.name: Double routine
double_routine.description_short: Complete at least 2 habits for 14 days
double_routine.description_long: Two weeks of dual dedication. You've proven you can juggle multiple commitments without dropping the ball.

discipline_month.name: Month of discipline
discipline_month.description_short: Complete at least 2 habits for 30 days
discipline_month.description_long: A month of unwavering double commitment. Your discipline is forging habits that will last a lifetime.

routine_master.name: Routine master
routine_master.description_short: Complete at least 3 habits for 60 days
routine_master.description_long: Two months with three habitsâ€”you've achieved mastery over your routine. Your dedication is truly inspiring.

centenarian.name: Centenarian
centenarian.description_long: One hundred days of showing up. A century of commitment that proves your dedication is no passing phase.

bicentenarian.name: Bicentenarian
bicentenarian.description_long: Two hundred days of consistent action. You've made habit-building a permanent part of your identity.

full_year.name: Full year champion
full_year.description_long: An entire year of dedication. Every season, every month, you showed up. You are a true habit champion.

streak_150.name: Five month flame
streak_150.description_short: Maintain a 150-day streak on one habit
streak_150.description_long: One hundred fifty consecutive days. Five months of unwavering dedication to a single habitâ€”you burn bright!

streak_365.name: Annual dedication
streak_365.description_short: Maintain a 365-day streak on one habit
